content: **crocheted top in drops belle piece is worked bottom up size s - xxxl** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern vs-091 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **materials** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 250-250-250-300-300-350 g colour 04 dandelion crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm **crochet gauge** 18 treble crochets in width and 9 row vertically = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
